page.title: 01A SUMMARY OF THE DISTRICT
page.content: Our area lies east of the city of {Norwich}in the county of Norfolk.It is bordered by one main road,the{A47}and the B1140.The area has scattered villages and small pockets of houses . Most of the roads meander.It is mainly grass and cropland.It has a few farms and nurseries.There are some quite large areas of woodland.The area has residential sections and two{hospitals .One of the hospitals is for handicapped people,the other is for people with mental illness. Most people in our area either work in the two hospitals,on the land or travel to Norwich or Great Yarmouth. There are four{churches}in the district, they are Church of England. There is also one cemetery .In the northwest section of our district is a {railway line}from Norwich to Cromer in north Norfolk.
